title: User Registration - Email Verification Workflow
description:
Test Objective: Validate the end-to-end user registration flow including email verification to ensure secure account creation.

Test Environment: Staging environment with SMTP email server enabled for testing.

Pre-requisites:

  • SMTP email service is running and accessible
  • Browser cache and cookies cleared
  • Test email address is accessible

Expected Security: Email verification token should expire after 24 hours and be single-use only.

test_steps.expected: Homepage loads with a visible 'Register' link
User is redirected to the registration page

test_steps.action: Enter valid user details (name, email, password) in the registration form
test_steps.expected: Fields accept the input and display no validation errors
Confirmation message is displayed stating that a verification email has been sent
Verification email is received within 2 minutes

test_steps.action: Click the verification link in the received email
test_steps.expected: User is redirected to the application and account is marked as verified

test_steps.action: Try logging in using the registered email and password
test_steps.expected: Login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard

test_steps.action: Verify the user's status in the database or admin panel
test_steps.expected: User is marked as 'Active' and 'Email Verified'

test_steps.action: Attempt to reuse the same verification link after successful activation
test_steps.expected: System displays an error or 'Link Expired' message

test_steps.action: Try registering again using the same email address
test_steps.expected: System shows error: 'Email already in use'

additional_fields.System.Tags: Registration; Email Verification; User Signup; Security
